scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix 'FrontEnd - Client' && npm start --prefix 'BackEnd - Server - MVC'
scripts.test: npm test --prefix 'BackEnd - Server - MVC' & npm test --prefix 'FrontEnd - Client'
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix 'FrontEnd - Client' && npm run cluster --prefix 'BackEnd - Server - MVC'
